channel.title: OSRS Banned
channel.description:
So I was playing osrs legit for the longest time. Then I went on a 6 month mission trip and when I came home I forgot my email and password that I used. So I just gave up and figured I would never get back into osrs again. Well after botting with those dummy accounts for 2 weeks I finally recovered my main! But the very next day I had all of my accounts banned. Even though I never botted on my main. I figure they just destroyed all accounts connected to my IP or something. Am I screwed or do you think it is possible to get that main account back? And how do I make an appeal? There is no more "make an appeal" option anymore and I cannot find any way to get a hold of jagex.
I appreciate all thoughts and advise you may have.
Thanks.

item.title: OSRS Banned
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Considering you’ve been botting for two weeks as you say, I’m pretty sure that’s a permanent ban. From my understanding of their streams, the new accounts are auto-banned as Jagex thinks a person is only going to sell that account or something. So the rest of your accounts along with your main are more than likely permanently banned as well thus non-appealable.

Read full topic

item.title: OSRS Banned
item.dc:creator: @WarTusk-RSPS WarTusk-RSPS
item.description:
@WarTusk-RSPS wrote:

Ruby:

You’re up shit creek mate

Ya that’s what it seems like.

Arbe:

Msg Jagex on twitter or reddit, only way if any.

I will give it a shot. Thanks

Read full topic
